message:
SYSTEM: SPARQL_Streams.pdf: Página 3
C-SPARQL Model
RDF-Streams
Pairs: RDF triple annotated with timestamp
                                 (<subj, pred, obj>, ts)
Window
Time-, or triple-, based definition
Outputs a stream of triple-pairs
Aggregates (orthogonal to streaming work) 
 Extends data with computed result
Evaluation Episodes
State evaluation period for a query
1. D. F. Barbieri, D. Braga, S. Ceri, and M. Grossniklaus. An execution environment for 
C-SPARQL queries. In EDBT2010, pp 441–452, Lausanne, Switzerland, March 2010.
2. D. F. Barbieri, D. Braga, S. Ceri, E. D. Valle, and M. Grossniklaus. C-SPARQL: A 
continuous query language for RDF data streams. International Journal of Semantic 
Computing, 2010. To appear.
speaker: SYSTEM
